mapper.select: select CASE `status` WHEN 1 THEN "激活" ELSE "未激活" END AS `status`, count(*) as count from user_info GROUP BY `status`
select a.dir_name, b.dir_name as `name` from dir_inf a INNER JOIN dir_inf b on a.dir_id=b.parent_dir where a.dir_user_id=#{user_id}
select * from user_info where username=#{uname} and password=#{upwd}
select * from user_info where user_id=#{userid} and `password`=#{oldpwd}
mapper.update: update user_info set photo=#{photopath} where user_id=#{userid}
mapper.select: select a.user_id,a.username,b.runame,b.gender,b.birthday,b.address,b.remark,b.telephone,a.photo,a.email from user_info a inner join user_detail_inf b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.user_id=#{user_id}
